description: This JDBC rule can process account creation requests, deletion requests, and modification requests that pertain to the role attribute. It logs debug messages if other account request types are submitted.

input.name: log
input.description: The log object associated with the SailPointContext.

input.name: context
input.description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database if necessary.

input.name: application
input.description: The application whose data file is being processed.

input.name: connection
input.description: A connection object to connect to database.

input.name: plan
input.description: The ProvisioningPlan created against the JDBC application.

output.name: result
output.description: A Provisioning Result object is desirable to return the status.IT can be a new object or part of  Provisioning Plan

name: AssignmentManager JDBC Provision
